feed.title: Raju Kalidindi
feed.subtitle: Hey, I'm Raju Kalidindi. I am pursuing my B.Tech in Computer Science from International Institute of Information Technology, Bhubaneswar. I love technology and follow the advancements in technology. I am a self taught Web and Android Developer with 1 year of experience. My interests include virtual reality, game development, augmented reality and also love to develop websites. Apart from academics I like to travel. Cricket and football are my favourite sport. I'm a Real madrid supporter. Love playing Fifa and I also enjoy eating donuts and brownies. My preferred editor is Atom.
